Flag.Description: 0 = no lore known, 1 = know their name, 2+ = more lore learned

Flag.Name: PREGNANCY_CORRUPTION
Flag.Description: Faerie/Phouka baby corruption (Faerie if <= 0, Phouka if > 0): new pregnancy initializes to 2, lowered by Pure Honey, raised by Phouka Whiskey

Flag.Name: FEMOIT_UNLOCKED
Flag.Description: Unlocked the option to feminise Benoit.

Flag.Name: BIMBO_FEMOIT_UNLOCKED
Flag.Description: Unlocked the option to bimbofy Benoit.

Flag.Name: FEMOIT_NEXTDAY_EVENT
Flag.Description: Proc the event the following day when you visit. Stores the minimum day number that the event can proc on.

Flag.Name: TAMANI_PREGNANCY_COUNT
Flag.Description: Just how many has she got stuffed in there?

Flag.Name: SHEILA_DISABLED
Flag.Description: 1 = told to avoid or you refused apology, 2 = baby issues, 3 = worm infested, 4 = Jojo's 'wife'

Flag.Name: KELLY_KIDS_MALE
Flag.Description: Tracks number of sons with Kelly. Total number of children is stored in KELLY_KIDS (FLAG: 908).

Flag.Name: SAVE_FILE_INTEGER_FORMAT_VERSION
Flag.Description: WARNING: Do NOT modify this value.

Flag.Name: LIZAN_ROGUE_SEX_COUNTER
Flag.Description: Times sexed with lizan. If this reaches 3, unlocks watersports scene, if watersports are enabled.

Flag.Name: CAMP_WALL_SKULLS
Flag.Description: Number of imp skulls hung on camp wall

Flag.Name: ERLKING_CANE_ATTACK_COUNTER
Flag.Description: Has a chance to break if ≥ 10

Flag.Name: KIHA_DESTROYING_CORRUPTED_GLADES
Flag.Description: 1 = Kiha is currently destroying corrupted glades

Flag.Name: AMILY_DESTROYING_CORRUPTED_GLADES
Flag.Description: 1 = Amily is currently destroying corrupted glades

Flag.Name: JOY_INTELLIGENCE
Flag.Description: Starts at 20, increases by 1-4 with each dose of Scholar's Tea, up to maximum of 50. Increases chance of successfully meditating.

Flag.Name: JOY_COCK_FONDNESS
Flag.Description: When this reaches 10, Joy won't take any more pink eggs.

Flag.Name: NEW_GAME_PLUS_LEVEL
Flag.Description: Current New Game+ level. Each ascension increments level by 1.

Flag.Name: NEW_GAME_PLUS_BONUS_UNLOCKED_HERM
Flag.Description: Unlocks hermaphrodite as a starting gender option.
